Welcome to “The ultimate guide for beginners in photo editing” course on Skylum’s Udemy Channel.

By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of the editing process and be able to apply different techniques to enhance your photos.



THE COURSE WILL FOCUS ON 4 KEY AREAS:


Fundamentals of Photo Editing

In this section, you will learn the essential skills and concepts that form the foundation of photo editing. You will explore all the basic points of photo editing, main techniques, stages, and principles. The main ways your business can benefit from photo editing are also covered in this section.


Software for Editing Photos

This section will cover the main features and functions of Photoshop, Lightroom, Snapseed, and Picsart, thus helping you select the best option for your specific needs. In this section, we will also focus on Luminar Neo and tell you why it’s worth using if you want to level up your photo-editing skills.


Most Popular Photo-Editing Styles

In this section, we'll introduce you to the most popular photo-editing software programs and mobile apps. You'll learn how to choose the right tools for your needs, and we'll take a deep dive into the next level of photo editing with Luminar Neo.


Photo Editing Practice

Your chance to apply previously acquired photo-editing skills, as it contains some practical lessons on how to perform basic editing tasks, such as cropping, adjusting exposure, and so on. Separate lessons in this section focus on portrait and landscape editing.

Vanelli — is a working sports and portrait photographer, educator, and author living in Florida. Software Requirements:

  • A C compiler: Students will need a C compiler installed on their computer to write and run C programs. There are many different compilers available, both free and commercial. Some popular options include GCC (GNU Compiler Collection), Clang, and Microsoft Visual Studio. Students should choose a compiler based on their operating system (e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux) and personal preferences.

  • A code editor or integrated development environment (IDE): Students will need a program to write and edit their C code. Some popular options include Visual Studio Code, Sublime Text, and Eclipse. An IDE like Code::Blocks or Dev-C++ can also be used, which typically include a code editor, compiler, and debugger in one package.

Shaw.

  • Patience and persistence: C programming can be challenging, especially for beginners. Students should expect to encounter errors and spend time debugging their code. It's important to stay patient and persistent in the face of these challenges.

  • A willingness to learn: C programming is a complex topic, but it can be mastered with practice and dedication. Students should be open to learning new concepts and techniques and be willing to put in the time and effort required to become proficient in C programming.

Overall, to succeed in a C programming course, you will need a computer with a C compiler, a text editor or IDE, C programming textbooks, and a positive mindset for learning and practicing.


After taking course, you need to practice the syntax and start writing C code and execute it. This practice will definitely help you to solve assignments correctly.


Happy Learning!!

courseDetails.title: Climate Change Explained: Causes, Consequences and Solutions
courseDetails.shortDescription: Climate Change Simplified for General Public
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hi everyone,

In this course, we will address the climate change phenomenon from many angles and we will discuss its causes, consequences, and solutions.

Greenhouse gases are the reason behind this phenomenon. These gases, mainly carbon dioxide, methane, and nitrous oxide, have increased in concentration in recent years in the atmosphere because of fossil fuel combustion, agriculture and livestock, and deforestation.

These gases hold solar radiation and increase the earth's temperature, which leads to global warming which eventually causes climate change. The increase of carbon dioxide concentration in the air causes also oceans acidification.

Climate change generates a lot of unwanted effects on many levels such as Extreme weather event intensification like floods and droughts, melting of ice caps and glaciers, propagation of diseases and pests, habitat destruction, coral bleaching, and many social and economic impacts.

Thus, we organized the course on climate change into three parts :

• Part one discusses direct causes of climate change, mainly fossil energy, agriculture, and deforestation, and indirect causes like capitalism, corporate lobbying, cryptocurrency, and science deniers. It also explains greenhouse gases' origins and the concepts of global warming and climate change.


• Part 2 details some of climate change consequences, such as :

     • Extreme weather and natural disasters

     • Ice Melting

     • Disease carrier and pest propagation

     • Habitat destruction and wildlife loss

     • Coral reef destruction

     • Economic and social consequences

• Part 3 is dedicated to solutions to stop climate change, which includes solutions on governmental and individual levels, renewable energy, and transport electrification.

I hope you enjoy the course!
targetAudiences: All learners can benefit from this course

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello everyone and welcome to the online-course created for any current or potential corporate managers from junior to executive level, that will make you stand out from the others.

This course might become your first step to acquire skill set, knowledges and maybe even a whole new profession, that is appearing right now. Learning it today, gives you advantages tomorrow!

I’m talking about digital transformation. In terms of customer communications in basically any meduim or big enterprises. And for small businesses, the most succesfull ones, they are already doing it in a modern way from the first day.

This transformation - it is a moving away from old way of communications, like phone calls, email, or even fax - to new way - whatsapp, facebook messenger, instagram direct messages, telegram - any messaging apps that people are using in their everyday life. And now they are starting to usу it to talk to businesses. To chat with an online store, with a bank, medical clinic - with any organization out there.

And here lies the opportunity!

All of these companies need employees or contractors who understand how to make this shift, this transition. New channels on the one hand bring a lot of new possibilities, such as chatbots and artificial intelligence, and on the other hand, require a rebuilding of current business workflows.

For example agent’s KPI in a contact centre based on whatsapp, is very different from a voice-based CC. And somebody need to know how to deal with it.

But the contact center is not the only place where apps like whatsapp are taking over. It affects pretty much every customer related departpent: sales, marketing and loyalty, support, customer experience, automation and online services.

So, Whether you plan to tie your career or business entirely to this feild, this knowledge will help you achieve your professional goals in a variety of ways. Because communication - is the essential part of business.

I started this journey seven years ago, when it was hardly even existed. Since then, I have worked with some of the world's biggest clients, such as Societe Generale, British american tobacco and others. Now I’m a founder of a startup called brandy. im

I invite you to my course where you will learn the basics about communications of the future. Welcome!



Before we start I want to give a quick intro of myself and also let’s take a look on the course plan.

So without further ado, here is what we will discuss

The course consists of 2 parts:

In a first one, everything down lesson 4, we are talking about the key benefits for business in general.

And then learning the basics of chatbots and AI.

The second part is becoming more specific.

We will see how exactly it implies to different departments. Discuss business application of particular messaging channels.

And with all of that we are getting ready to meet the main framework –

of ideal customer journey in modern channels. Which will be useful tool to any of your further projects.

And briefly about me.

You can call me Slava. For a last 7 years I’ve been running chat platform startup. For these years we made a lot of stuff, worked with some worldwide clients.

We have become official provider of apple messages for business. Not sure if this is my most significant achievement, but personally, the most pleasant one. A chance to work directly with apple team is really cool

and I have been honoured to become one of the business experts at the Retail banking school, where we are right now.

Feel free to connect or ask me anything on linkedin.

And, let’s jump in!

So I hope this online course will be a good start on mastering this new world of digital communications and happier customers

courseDetails.title: Project Management Fundamentals: A Beginner's Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Essentials of Project Management: Learn Planning, Risk Management, and Team Communication
courseDetails.longDescription:
Project management is an exciting field to work in. As a project manager, you have the power to drive the success of your organization, introduce innovative technologies, revolutionize the business world, and impact all aspects of a company. After gaining enough experience, project managers frequently advance to full-time management jobs, where they can further hone their skills and earn a solid income.

In our Project Management course, we’ll explore the essential concepts of project management that every beginner needs to know. Whether you're new to project management or looking to refresh your knowledge, this course will provide you with a solid foundation to build upon. For example, you’ll learn practical strategies and techniques to apply to your projects immediately.

We’ll start with the basics and move on to more complex tasks, such as the essence of projects and their varieties; the role of the project manager on the team; planning, cost calculation, and risk assessment; as well as the distribution of tasks between developers. Through our project management course, you will learn to solve any work problems that arise.


IN OUR COMPLETE PROJECT MANAGEMENT TRAINING, WE’LL COVER TOPICS SUCH AS:


  1. METHODOLOGIES

You’ll work with different frameworks and methodologies for project management. You’ll learn how Waterfall differs from iterative approaches, why SCRUM is not a panacea, and how Worksection can improve your efficiency.

  • Explore Scrum, understand Scrum roles, ceremonies, and principles, and learn how to apply Scrum in real projects.

  • Discover the flexible Kanban methodology, learn core Kanban principles like visualizing workflow and limiting work in progress, and understand how Kanban improves efficiency and workflow management.

  • Set up a customized Kanban system for your team, measure performance with Kanban metrics, and drive continuous improvement.


  1. STAKEHOLDERS

You’ll learn how to build effective communication between all parties working on the project, including the client, the management, and the team. You’ll learn how to discuss and implement changes quickly. You’ll understand how to interact with stakeholders and quickly resolve conflicts.


  1. TEAM

Want to learn how to best combine individual specialists into a productive team? We’ll teach how to determine the life cycle of a team according to the Tuckman and Jensen models. Let's explain how to develop and motivate its participants. As a result, you’ll be able to organize their autonomous work.


We look at lots of real-life project management examples and give you practical tools that you can use right away to achieve better results on your projects. Whether managing a small, at-home project or an entire global corporate expansion, this course will empower you to become someone who is always one step ahead.

After completing this project management course, you will be familiar with the world's best practices and project management tools and be equipped to tackle any project with confidence.


YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN PROJECT MANAGEMENT FROM TOP PROFESSIONALS:

  • We have over 14 years of experience in online marketing and education. Our Webpromo Agency has both Google Premier Partner and Facebook Marketing Partner statuses.

  • We've launched over 2,000 successful marketing and education projects throughout our careers.

  • Anton Voroniuk is also a project delivery expert. He has many years of experience managing projects and integrating change in companies of varying sizes.

  • Over 500,000 specialists worldwide have enrolled in our online courses. Our blog and YouTube tutorials help the Skillsbooster community stay in the loop and get all the tips they need to succeed in digital marketing and other fields.


OUR PM TRAINING INCLUDES:

  • Theory: 2+ hours of lectures with plenty of hands-on examples. Lessons range from 3 to 11 minutes and are easy to follow.

  • Practice Materials: Checklists, templates, and video tutorials to make the course more interactive and valuable.

  • Lifetime access to the course and all future updates.

  • 24/7 Support: If you have any questions, I will always be willing to answer them.

  • A free copy of the book “Cutting-Edge Digital Marketing: How to Attract Customers and Increase Online Sales".

  • Complete this PM course and receive an Udemy certificate.


SHOULD YOU BE WORRIED?

This project management course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee.


Join us on this exciting learning journey, and let's get started right now on your project management career.

¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, vamos utilizar el plugin All in One WP Migration.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.



¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo instalar correctamente el plugin All in One WP Migration.

  • Cómo migrar correctamente un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting.

  • Cómo exportar tu sitio web de WordPress desde tu dominio actual.

  • Cómo importar tu sitio web de WordPress a un nuevo dominio.

  • Cómo actualizar las URLS de la Base de Datos de tu sitio web migrado.

courseDetails.title: Master Splits & Conditioning for Martial or Performance Arts

courseDetails.longDescription:
Train like Neo from The Matrix to squat like a ninja and dance with the grace of a samurai. Why You’ll Love This Course:

Train for peak performance across martial arts, dance, yoga, acting, and modeling

Si eres un principiante en el mundo de la visualización de datos y estás buscando una manera de aprender a utilizar Power BI, este curso es para ti. Aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber sobre Power BI desde cero, desde la conexión de datos hasta la creación de gráficos y la definición de KPI.

Una de las primeras cosas que aprenderás en este curso es cómo conectar diferentes fuentes de datos, como Excel, la web y PDF, para utilizarlos en Power BI. Aprenderás cómo hacer esto utilizando Power Query, que te permitirá transformar tus datos de manera eficiente.

Una vez que tengas tus datos conectados, comenzarás a crear diferentes tipos de gráficos, como barras, circulares, treemaps y series de tiempo. Aprenderás cómo utilizar estas herramientas para visualizar tus datos de una manera clara y concisa, lo que te permitirá tomar decisiones más informadas.

Además, también aprenderás sobre DAX, una herramienta que te permitirá crear medidas personalizadas y calculadas. Con DAX, podrás crear KPI y reportes personalizados para que puedas ver fácilmente cómo están funcionando tus negocios.

Finalmente, aprenderás a diseñar reportes y definir KPI utilizando Power BI. Esto te permitirá presentar tus datos de manera efectiva, lo que te ayudará a tomar decisiones informadas sobre el futuro de tu negocio.

Al final del curso, habrás desarrollado tu primer reporte en Power BI, lo que te permitirá comenzar a utilizar esta herramienta para mejorar tu negocio y tomar decisiones informadas basadas en datos.

En resumen, este curso te proporcionará todas las habilidades necesarias para comenzar a utilizar Power BI para visualizar y analizar tus datos de una manera efectiva. Desde la conexión de datos hasta la creación de gráficos y la definición de KPI, este curso te enseñará todo lo que necesitas saber para empezar a utilizar Power BI con éxito.

Inscríbete hoy y comienza a dominar Power BI para el análisis de datos y la visualización de resultados.

¡No pierdas la oportunidad de avanzar en tu carrera con una de las herramientas de análisis de datos más poderosas del mercado!

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y Elementor PRO 2024
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web con WordPress y Elementor PRO, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y ELEMENTOR PRO PARA AUMENTAR LAS VENTAS DE TU NEGOCIO?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor en su versión PRO, que llevarán el diseño de su sitio web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web en WordPress, con el constructor visual de Elementor en su versión PRO, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

courseDetails.title: Management skills training: the business acronym essentials
courseDetails.shortDescription: Powerful management tools for developing strategic decisions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Forget memorizing endless lists. This course will transform acronyms from confusing jargon to powerful tools for analyzing situations, developing strategies, and making informed decisions.

Welcome to the world of management, where acronyms reign supreme! From GOSPA to PESTLE, TOWS to SWOT, you'll encounter a seemingly endless alphabet soup of terms that can feel overwhelming at first. But fear not, aspiring leader! This course is your acronym decoder ring— unlocking their meaning, application, and how they can equip you to navigate the complexities of the business landscape.

Forget memorizing endless lists. This course will transform acronyms from confusing jargon to powerful tools for analyzing situations, developing strategies, and making informed decisions. By exploring real-world examples and case studies, you'll gain the confidence and clarity to not only understand these acronyms but also apply them effectively in your management journey.

While the sheer number of acronyms used in various fields, especially management, can feel overwhelming, understanding them offers significant advantages that extend far beyond simply avoiding confusion. Here's why taking a dedicated course on acronyms can be a valuable investment for your professional development:

1. Enhance Communication and Collaboration:

  • Acronyms are a universal language in many industries, facilitating efficient communication within teams and across departments. Mastering them allows you to understand instructions, reports, and presentations clearly, fostering better collaboration and avoiding misunderstandings.

2. Boost Confidence and Credibility:

  • Using acronyms accurately and confidently demonstrates professionalism and familiarity with the field. This can enhance your credibility in the eyes of colleagues, clients, and superiors, giving you a competitive edge.

3. Develop Critical Thinking Skills:

  • Understanding the meaning and purpose behind each acronym goes beyond mere memorization. It encourages you to think critically about the underlying concepts and frameworks they represent, fostering your problem-solving and analytical skills.

4. Gain a Deeper Understanding of Management Frameworks:

  • Many acronyms in management are associated with powerful frameworks and methodologies used to analyze situations, develop strategies, and make informed decisions. Learning their applications allows you to think strategically and approach challenges from various perspectives.

5. Navigate Diverse Business Environments:

  • Acronyms are not limited to a single industry or organization. A basic grasp of common acronyms used across various business settings can help you adapt and navigate different professional environments more effectively.

6. Save Time and Effort:

  • Once you understand the meaning and purpose of acronyms, you can process information and communication faster, saving valuable time and improving your overall efficiency in the workplace.

7. Unlock the Potential for Lifelong Learning:

  • By learning how to decipher and utilize acronyms, you equip yourself with a valuable skill that can be applied throughout your career. This empowers you to stay updated with emerging trends and readily integrate new information into your knowledge base.

So, while a sea of acronyms may initially appear daunting, taking the time to understand and leverage them can significantly impact your professional development, communication skills, and overall success.

So, buckle up and get ready to decipher the code and unlock your potential to thrive in the exciting world of management!
targetAudiences: New managers or recently promoted managers
Experienced managers wanting to improve their skills
Technical employees seeking future management positions
Young potentials seeking for a head start

courseDetails.title: Curso SQL - Consultas en SQL para principiantes + ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en bases de datos, te enseñará SQL desde cero.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Aprende SQL desde cero y conviértete en un experto en bases de datos con este curso completo de SQL. Este curso te guiará a través de todos los aspectos esenciales de SQL, desde la creación de bases de datos y consultas básicas hasta la optimización avanzada de consultas.

En este curso, adquirirás un sólido conocimiento de SQL y desarrollarás habilidades prácticas que te permitirán trabajar eficientemente con bases de datos. Comenzaremos con una introducción detallada a SQL y su importancia en el campo laboral actual, explorando las diversas oportunidades profesionales que ofrece.

Aprenderás a instalar y configurar MySQL en Windows, crear bases de datos y gestionar usuarios. Conocerás la sintaxis básica de SQL y utilizarás la popular herramienta MySQL Workbench para ejecutar consultas.

Dominarás las consultas SELECT con una sola tabla, aprenderás a utilizar alias de columnas y a filtrar datos utilizando la cláusula WHERE. Descubrirás los operadores de comparación y lógicos para realizar consultas más complejas, y utilizarás operadores como BETWEEN, LIKE e IN para refinar tus resultados.

Exploraremos las cláusulas ORDER BY y LIMIT para ordenar y limitar los resultados de tus consultas. Aprenderás a utilizar funciones de agregado como COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX y MIN para obtener información resumida de tus datos. Además, entenderás los conceptos de llaves primarias y foráneas, y te sumergirás en el mundo de los joins, incluyendo inner join, left join y right join.

Además, este curso te enseñará a utilizar subconsultas en diferentes cláusulas (SELECT, FROM, WHERE y HAVING) para realizar consultas más complejas y obtener datos específicos. Aprenderás a identificar y optimizar consultas lentas, utilizando índices y ajustando la memoria caché para mejorar el rendimiento de tu base de datos.

Enriqueciendo aún más el contenido del curso, se incluye un módulo innovador sobre la integración de ChatGPT para la creación y consulta de bases de datos. Aprenderás a utilizar las capacidades avanzadas de ChatGPT para generar consultas SQL, interpretar y analizar resultados de bases de datos, y automatizar tareas de gestión de datos. Este enfoque te permitirá aprovechar la inteligencia artificial para facilitar el manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos y realizar consultas complejas de manera más eficiente. Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios interactivos, podrás ver cómo ChatGPT puede ser una herramienta poderosa para complementar tus habilidades en SQL y llevarte al siguiente nivel en el campo de las bases de datos.


Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios, este curso te brinda las herramientas necesarias para convertirte en un experto en SQL y maximizar tu eficiencia en el manejo de bases de datos. No importa si eres un principiante absoluto o si ya tienes experiencia en SQL, este curso te llevará desde los fundamentos hasta la optimización de consultas, brindándote las habilidades necesarias para destacar en el campo laboral.


¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu camino hacia la maestría en SQL!

courseDetails.title: SQL: Desde cero para principiantes (Linux)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en Data Science, te enseñará bases de datos desde cero.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Todo analista de datos requiere, para trabajar, de datos. El problema es que no siempre son sencillos de obtener. Para algunos analistas resulta cotidiano el trabajar con archivos de texto plano como csv o directamente Excel, pero lo cierto es que la información real de las empresas se almacena en lo que se denominan bases de datos.


Estas bases de datos son, en esencia, enormes interconexiones entre tablas que se relacionan entre sí. En la enorme mayoría de las empresas este es el paradigma dominante, el modelo relacional. Consta de tener la información compartimentada en distintas tablas de modo que la información ocupe el menor espacio posible, pero que pueda ser recolectada mediante la unión de diversas tablas. Además de este enfoque, también existen los modelos no relacionales, que tienen una lógica distinta.


¿Qué es SQL?

Sus siglas significan Structured Query Lenguage, y tal como lo indica su nombre, es el lenguaje mediante el cual se le realizan consultas a la base de datos. Dicha consulta puede implicar obtener toda la información de una tabla, información filtrada ya sea por fila o columna, la unión de diversas tablas, entre muchas otras posibilidades. También permite generar agregaciones y obtener indicadores a partir de los datos en la propia consulta.


¿Qué voy a aprender en este curso de SQL?

En este curso de SQL, aprenderás a crear bases de datos, tablas, podrás actualizar datos y realizaras consultas de información.

Cada video cubre un tema específico en profundidad. Este curso te dará las herramientas para poder convertirte en un analista o científico de datos.

Los detalles de cada módulo se listan arriba en caso de que necesites información adicional sobre cada módulo.

Este curso online de SQL está diseñado para todo el mundo que quiera empezar a aprender a utilizar SQL a profundidad.

¡El curso con mas valor: Python desde cero + Data Analysis + Visualizaciones en Matplot!


Python es un lenguaje de programación de código abierto, orientado a objetos, muy simple y fácil de entender. Tiene una sintaxis sencilla que cuenta con una vasta biblioteca de herramientas, que hacen de Python un lenguaje de programación único.


Saber programar en Python es una habilidad solicitada por las empresas de todo el mundo. Un programador Jr. en Python gana $77,000 USD al año en promedio.


¿Qué esperas? Te llevaremos de la mano en cada uno de los temas para que te conviertas en un experto de Python y del Data Analysis.

El objetivo de la primera sección del curso es que sin conocimientos previos aprendas con ejercicios prácticos a:

  • Definir funciones.

  • Crear clases y objetos con la POO.

En la segunda sección del curso aprenderemos:

Tambien abordamos varios ejercicios donde ponemos en practica lo aprendido durante las lecciones.

courseDetails.title: Timeboxing: A Short and Practical Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Very Useful Technique to Boost your Productivity!
courseDetails.longDescription:
• We live in a busy world, where we are expected to accomplish so many things within a short amount of time.

  • The average adult has to manage work, family, friends, social media, voluntary work, going to the gym, and side hustle, among many other tasks...

  • Consequently, we often find ourselves overwhelmed by the amount of tasks we are supposed to do, and that’s where time management saves the day.

  • Time management helps you achieve work and personal goals, plan tasks, set priorities, eliminate disruptive effects, and increase work efficiency and productivity.

  • While there are many time management techniques available today, in this course we will focus mainly on the time management technique of Timeboxing.

01 Introduction

03 What is Timeboxing?

04 How to use Timeboxing?

06 Tips for a Successful Timeboxing

07 Let’s Try It!

09 Conclusion


By the end of the course, you will be able to:


  1. Learn what is Timeboxing and how to apply it

  2. Gain an understanding of the benefits of Timeboxing

courseDetails.title: Fórmulas y funciones en Microsoft Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Luis, Microsoft Certified Educator y Excel Expert, te enseñará funciones de la A a la Z.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Quieres ahorrar tiempo en tus labores diarias aprovechando el potencial de Excel?

Este curso está diseñado para convertirte en un maestro de las fórmulas y funciones de Excel, una habilidad esencial para el análisis de datos y la toma de decisiones basada en datos. Comenzarás con un sólido fundamento en conceptos básicos, aprendiendo a crear fórmulas eficientes, y avanzarás rápidamente hacia la construcción de funciones complejas que te permitirán manipular y analizar datos con una precisión impresionante.

Aprenderás a navegar por el corazón de Excel, utilizando operadores para realizar cálculos aritméticos y de comparación. Te enseñaremos cómo obtener porcentajes que revelan tendencias y variaciones en tus datos, y cómo las referencias relativas, absolutas y mixtas pueden hacer tus fórmulas tanto flexibles como robustas.

Las funciones de texto te permitirán limpiar y organizar tus datos para presentaciones claras, mientras que las funciones estadísticas y matemáticas abrirán un nuevo mundo de posibilidades analíticas, desde contar y sumar condiciones hasta calcular promedios dinámicos. Las funciones de fecha y hora te proporcionarán las herramientas para rastrear y administrar datos basados en el tiempo de manera eficiente.

Dominarás las funciones de búsqueda y referencia como BUSCARV y BUSCARH, cruciales para la gestión de grandes conjuntos de datos y la extracción de información significativa. Las funciones lógicas se convertirán en tus aliadas para ejecutar decisiones condicionales complejas y manejar excepciones con inteligencia y eficacia.

Culminaremos con una sección dedicada a la prevención y corrección de errores comunes, asegurando que mantengas la integridad de tus datos. Con ejercicios prácticos y ejemplos del mundo real, este curso te equipará con el conocimiento para utilizar Excel a su máxima capacidad, convirtiendo datos brutos en decisiones y estrategias informadas.

No dejes pasar la oportunidad de convertirte en un experto en Excel.

¡Inscríbete ya y comienza a desbloquear el verdadero poder de tus datos!

Descubre el poder de la visualización de datos y el análisis de negocios con nuestro curso de Power BI para principiantes. Aprende a transformar datos en insights valiosos y toma decisiones informadas con una de las herramientas más potentes de Business Intelligence.

¿Qué Aprenderás?

Al final del curso, tendrás las habilidades necesarias para transformar datos en insights y crear dashboards que marquen la diferencia en el mundo de los negocios. ¡Empieza tu camino hacia el dominio de Power BI hoy!

Elementor Hosting es un alojamiento de WordPress administrado con tecnología de la plataforma de Google Cloud, plataforma en la que confían miles de empresas de primer nivel gracias a su seguridad y confiabilidad de clase mundial.

IGOR DMITRIEV
Digital Business and Retail Banking Expert

Education:

• MBA, The Boston University, USA

• Master of Science at Engineering (Technical) Management, The State University of New York at Buffalo, USA

• Master of Science at Informatics and Economics, The Saint- Petersburg State University of Finance and Economics, Russia

• Six Sigma Black Belt

Experience:

• Expert at Banking (>15 years), FinTech & Digital (>12 years). Experienced Manager (>10 years) with successful track of records at personal and corporate entrepreneurship.

• More than 10 years at worldwide banking groups such us Societe Generale, Raiffeisenbank.

• Experience at roles: CEO, Head of Business, Chief Digital & Marketing Officer, Head of Digital Transformation and Channels, Head of Products and Marketing.



What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team


Linked topics:

  • Project Management

  • Basic office skills

  • Basic Business skills

  • Communication skills

  • Organizational skills

courseDetails.title: Fundamentos de Programación: Aprende a programar desde cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: De la teoría a la práctica
courseDetails.longDescription:
Este es un curso pensado para dotar al estudiante de los conocimientos necesarios para comenzar a trabajar en el ámbito de la programación. A continuación sus principales características:


  1. División en capítulos que forman una unidad en sí mismo, en donde se exponen los objetivos de aprendizaje en forma concreta y práctica, con un marco teórico explicado en forma clara y concisa, proponiendo enseguida ejercicios para aplicar y entender lo visto en cada capítulo.


  2. Es un curso actualizado, y construído sobre la base de aplicar de inmediato los conceptos teóricos. La premisa fundamental del curso es dar al estudiante las herramientas para aprender a programar de forma independiente a cualquier lenguaje de programación.


  3. Se incluyen dos capítulos especiales, muy actuales como son el uso de Estándares y Buenas prácticas de programación y otro de recomendaciones a los futuros (o actuales) programadores, basadas en la experiencia contraída por tantos años de trabajo del instructor.


  4. Como parte complementaria, este curso incluye un mini curso de bases de datos, muy completo para brindar una capacitación acorde a las necesidades del mercado de las TI.


  5. Además los alumnos tendrán acceso al código fuente de aplicaciones desarrolladas por el instructor, que lo podrán usar de base para estudiar, probar y por qué no, usar en sus futuros trabajos.


  6. El curso tendrá un examen final que constará de una parte teórica y otra parte práctica, lo que permitirá poner a prueba los conocimientos ofrecidos en el curso.


  7. Se incluye un conjunto muy completo de recursos, desde ejercicios, con sus soluciones, software complementario para el desarrollo de sistemas, y otra serie de elementos que aportarán al estudiante las herramientas para sacar el máximo provecho de este curso.
targetAudiences: El curso está dirigido a los estudiantes que quieran comenzar a trabajar en el mundo del desarrollo de software

Learn Ansible Automation skills from scratch to an advanced level for automating your Network.

For attending this course you don't need any prior coding experience.

Below are the topics in high level

  • The course will be starting with how to setup Lab for Ansible Network Automation Practice

  • Setup VSCode for SSH remote development

  • Ansible Vault for encrypting files and variables

  • group_vars and host_vars

  • Handle device specific variables and configurations effectively

  • cisco ios_facts and ios_commands module

  • cisco ios_config module explained in detail

  • PaloAlto Firewall Galaxy Collections Examples

  • PaloAlto Address Objects, Object Groups and Security Rule automation using Ansible

  • Cisco config diff, parent command, before, after, match and replace options

  • ios config backup options

  • Configuration backup and save option

  • Cisco ios resource modules

  • cisco ios_user and static_route module

  • CLI Parsers

  • pyATS, ntc_templates and TextFSM Parsers

  • Ansible  Magic Variables

  • hostvars and play_vars

  • Ansible Variable precedence explained in detail

  • Ansible filter Plugins

  • default, ternary, dict2items, items2dict filters

  • to_json, from_json, to_yaml, from_yaml  filters

  • zip, combine, map,json_query(using JMES Path) filters

  • ip_address, url and datetime filters

  • list operations and string manipulation using filters

  • RegEX Filters

  • Regex search, find_all and replace filters

  • Jinja2 templates example

  • jinja2 for loop and include option

  • jinja2 in ios_config module

  • embed code in jinja2 template

  • lookup Plugins

  • file lookup, template lookup plugins

  • vars, env and pipe lookup plugins

  • Loops and Conditionals :  loops, until and when

  • Play Options

    • ansible play strategies, forks and serial

    • debugger for effective troubleshooting

    • host order, log_path

    • tags and limit option

    • check_mode

  • Task Options

    • delegate_to

    • run_once

    • ignore_erros and failed when

    • changed_when and no_log

  • use handlers and listen option

  • block and rescue for exception handling

  • assert option

  • How to install ansible collections: using galaxy command, requirements file and github

  • How to create roles and add tasks to respective directories

  • Detailed explanation of ansible include vs import

  • include_tasks vs import tasks

  • include_role vs import role

  • import_playbook module

  • how to create ansible custom modules

    • convert facts to csv file using custom module which uses python csv in the backend

    • how to pass module args to custom module

    • how to return data using custom module

  • REST API from Ansible

    • how to use URI Module for REST API

    • YANG Suite introduction

    • REST API from Postman

    • Convert POSTMAN REST request to Ansible URI task

    • Initiate REST - GET, PUT,POST PATCH and DELETE Operations from Ansible

    • How to configure Cisco device using REST API

    • how to save config using rest API

    • Parse config using REST API


  • Extra Learning Topic(AWX)

    • Install AWX in Minikube for learning

    • Basics of Ansible execution environment (Podman)

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma in Corporate Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Diploma in Corporate Management by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Corporate Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Short Description: Course will be interesting to anybody who want to acquire essential skills about Corporate management. This course will take practical examples to explain basic principles of corporate management and how it is important in  business. This will help in developing as a corporate person and become a better manager.


Management learning is critically important for both companies and individual managers, as it plays a pivotal role in achieving organizational success, fostering leadership skills, and advancing individual careers. Here's why management learning is significant for companies and managers:


For Companies:

Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency: Effective management practices help streamline workflows, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize processes. When managers are well-versed in management principles, companies can operate more productively, leading to cost savings and improved profitability.


Innovation and Adaptability: In a rapidly changing business environment, companies must continuously innovate and adapt. Management learning equips managers with the tools and knowledge to foster a culture of innovation and navigate through evolving market conditions.


Employee Engagement and Retention: Skilled managers can create a positive work environment, motivate employees, and build strong teams. This leads to higher employee engagement and lower turnover rates, reducing recruitment and training costs for the company.


Strategic Decision-Making: Management education provides managers with the ability to make informed, data-driven decisions. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills are essential for achieving long-term business goals.


Conflict Resolution and Communication: Effective communication and conflict resolution are vital in any organization. Managers with management training are better equipped to handle conflicts, promote teamwork, and maintain a harmonious workplace.


Risk Management: Companies face various risks, from financial to operational and reputational. Management learning helps managers identify, assess, and mitigate these risks, ensuring the company's stability and sustainability.


Customer Satisfaction: Managers with a deep understanding of management principles are more likely to focus on customer needs and satisfaction. This customer-centric approach can lead to increased loyalty and revenue.


For Managers:

Career Advancement: Management learning is crucial for career growth. Employers often prioritize candidates with management education and experience when filling leadership positions.


Leadership Development: Management education enhances leadership skills, including decision-making, problem-solving, and team management. These skills are transferable and valuable throughout one's career.


Increased Confidence: Managers who undergo management training gain confidence in their abilities. This confidence translates into better leadership and a greater capacity to handle challenging situations.


Networking Opportunities: Management courses and programs often facilitate networking with peers and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new opportunities and insights.


Personal Growth: Management learning is not only about career advancement but also personal growth. It encourages self-reflection, self-improvement, and a better understanding of one's strengths and weaknesses.


Adaptation to Change: In today's dynamic business world, the ability to adapt to change is essential. Management education equips managers with the skills to thrive in uncertain and evolving environments.


Job Satisfaction: Effective management leads to more successful teams and projects, which can result in greater job satisfaction for managers. A fulfilling career is often linked to the ability to manage and lead effectively.


In conclusion, management learning is vital for both companies and managers. It empowers organizations to operate efficiently, innovate, and achieve their goals while providing managers with the tools and knowledge needed for career growth, personal development, and effective leadership. A strong foundation in management principles benefits everyone involved and contributes to long-term success.
targetAudiences: Professionals with any background who wants to upgrade management skills

¡Empieza desde cero con JavaScript y NodeJS!

Si eres un estudiante o profesionista que quiere potenciar su carrera profesional te tengo una buena noticia:

Node.js es un entorno de tiempo de ejecución de JavaScript (de ahí su terminación en .js haciendo alusión al lenguaje JavaScript).

Este entorno de tiempo de ejecución en tiempo real incluye todo lo que se necesita para ejecutar un programa escrito en JavaScript. También aporta muchos beneficios y soluciona muchísimos problemas, por lo que sería más que interesante realizar nuestro curso de Node.js para obtener las bases, conceptos y habilidades necesarias que nos motiven a profundizar en sus opciones e iniciar la programación.

Node.js fue creado por los desarrolladores originales de JavaScript. Lo transformaron de algo que solo podía ejecutarse en el navegador en algo que se podría ejecutar en los ordenadores como si de aplicaciones independientes se tratara. Gracias a Node.js se puede ir un paso más allá en la programación con JavaScript no solo creando sitios web interactivos, sino teniendo la capacidad de hacer cosas que otros lenguajes de secuencia de comandos como Python pueden crear.

Tanto JavaScript como Node.js se ejecutan en el motor de tiempo de ejecución JavaScript V8 (V8 es el nombre del motor de JavaScript que alimenta Google Chrome. Es lo que toma nuestro JavaScript y lo ejecuta mientras navega con Chrome). Este motor coge el código JavaScript y lo convierte en un código de máquina más rápido. El código de máquina es un código de nivel más bajo que la computadora puede ejecutar sin necesidad de interpretarlo primero, ignorando la compilación y por lo tanto aumentando su velocidad.


¿Listo para aprender uno de los lenguajes más demandado en la industria de la programación?


El 89% de los estudiantes del curso también ha mejorado su situación laboral.

¡Inscríbete ahora y desarrolla esa habilidad que te hace falta!

R: No. Te guiaremos paso por paso en la instalación de cada una de las herramientas necesarias para el desarrollo adecuado del curso.

R: No. Te guiaremos desde cero hasta desplegar tu proyecto en la nube como un profesional.

R: Aprenderás los conceptos y fundamos de JavaScript, crearas un proyecto REST API con Node JS, lo conectarás a una base de datos en la nube y podrás concluir desplegando tu proyecto en el mundo real, internet.

JavaScript es el lenguaje numero uno de internet, con los fundamentos que dominaras aquí lograrás introducirte también en el mundo del desarrollo web frontend con marcos como React, Vue o Angular. Después de este curso, te será sencillo comprender otros frameworks JavaScript.

courseDetails.title: Microsoft SQL Server: Análisis de datos con Tableau
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mejora tus habilidades analíticas comerciales con SQL y visualización de datos
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Por qué estudiar SQL?

El Lenguaje SQL (Structured Query Language) es un lenguaje de computación diseñado para el fácil acceso y obtención de información de una Base de Datos.

Saber programar en SQL es la habilidad más solicitada por las empresas de todo el mundo.

¿Qué esperas? ¡Inscríbete ya!

Como la mayoría de los datos comerciales se almacenan en bases de datos relacionales, aprender SQL es esencial para cualquier persona que desee ser analista de datos.

SQL es la herramienta principal utilizada para manipular datos en bases de datos relacionales, por lo que es necesario dominar SQL para realizar análisis de datos profundos.

Aprenderás a explotar información utilizando funciones como: funciones de agregación y fecha en sus consultas.

Además, aprenderá a unir varias tablas en sus consultas para recuperar los datos que necesita para sus análisis.

Lo que aprenderás:

  • Aprenderás las funciones y los comandos SQL necesarios para las consultas SELECT

  • Cree consultas complejas para el análisis de datos

  • Cargue datos en la aplicación Tableau para iniciar la visualización de datos

  • Cree diagramas y gráficos profesionales para el análisis de datos

  • Cree un panel en Tableau para informes y presentaciones.

¿Hay requisitos para realizar el curso?

  • Sistema operativo Windows

¿Para quién es este curso?

  • Aquellos que necesitan aprender a crear consultas SQL complejas y diagramas y gráficos de datos profesionales para el análisis de datos.

courseDetails.title: Day Trading Guide: How To Make Money Day Trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Day Trading: Strategies, Tools, and Risk Management for Success in the Fast-Paced Financial Markets
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take control of your financial future and unlock the potential of day trading? Join us in this comprehensive course, designed for aspiring traders and seasoned investors alike, as we delve into the exciting world of day trading.


In "Day Trading Guide: How To Make Money Day Trading," you will learn how to navigate the dynamic landscape of day trading with confidence and skill. Our course covers everything from foundational concepts to advanced strategies that can help you capitalize on market movements and maximize your profits.


Throughout the course, you’ll discover essential techniques for analyzing market trends, understanding technical indicators, and interpreting chart patterns. You will learn how to read different types of charts—line, bar, and candlestick—and recognize key formations that indicate potential buy or sell signals. With practical insights and actionable advice, you’ll be equipped to make informed trading decisions and seize opportunities as they arise.


Risk management is a cornerstone of successful trading, and our course places a strong emphasis on this critical aspect. You will learn how to identify potential risks in your trades and develop effective strategies to mitigate them. We will guide you in setting appropriate stop-loss and take-profit levels, ensuring that you protect your capital while maximizing potential gains. Understanding and managing risk will give you the confidence to navigate the often volatile trading environment.


Additionally, we delve into the psychological aspects of trading, which are just as crucial as the technical and fundamental analysis. Day trading can be emotionally taxing, and maintaining a disciplined mindset is vital for long-term success. You’ll learn how to manage emotions like fear, greed, and overconfidence, which can often cloud judgment and lead to costly mistakes. Strategies for maintaining emotional resilience and discipline will be explored, allowing you to approach trading with clarity and composure.


What sets this course apart? You’ll have access to real-world examples, proven strategies, and a supportive community of fellow traders. We will provide you with numerous case studies and simulations to practice your skills in a risk-free environment before you start trading with real capital. This hands-on experience will help reinforce your learning and build your confidence.


By the end of this course, you will be empowered to:


  • Develop a solid foundation in day trading concepts and terminology.

  • Implement effective trading strategies tailored to various market conditions.

  • Analyze charts and use technical indicators to inform your trading decisions.

  • Manage risk and control emotions to enhance your trading discipline and performance.

  • Create and refine a personalized trading plan that aligns with your financial goals and risk tolerance.


This course is suitable for anyone with an interest in day trading, whether you are a complete beginner or someone looking to refine your existing skills. With flexible learning options, you can progress at your own pace—whenever and wherever you choose.


Don’t miss out on this opportunity to transform your financial future! Enroll now and take the first step toward mastering day trading and achieving your financial independence. Your journey to becoming a successful day trader starts here—let's embark on this exciting adventure together!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Traders This group includes individuals who are new to trading and are looking to learn the fundamentals of day trading. They may have little to no prior experience and are seeking structured guidance to understand the key concepts, tools, and strategies necessary for success in the day trading arena.

Part-Time Traders This group consists of individuals who may have some experience in trading but wish to enhance their skills and knowledge to trade more effectively on a part-time basis. They are looking to refine their trading strategies, improve their risk management techniques, and develop a better understanding of market analysis to optimize their trading performance alongside other commitments.

Investors Transitioning to Active Trading This group includes seasoned investors who primarily engage in long-term investing and are interested in transitioning to a more active day trading approach. They may already have a solid understanding of financial markets but seek to adapt their strategies to capitalize on short-term price movements, requiring a deeper exploration of day trading techniques and psychological aspects of active trading.
